plot: Amerigo, the horse of St. Nicholas, can suddenly talk. A villain steals the horse and hopes to win a talent contest with it. Will the Club, with the help of Stijn, succeed in finding the horse back before St. Nicholas' eve?
title: De Club van Sinterklaas & Het Pratende Paard
plot_es: Amerigo, the horse of St. Nicholas, can suddenly talk. A villain steals the horse and hopes to win a talent contest with it. Will the Club, with the help of Stijn, succeed in finding the horse back before St. Nicholas' eve?
original_name: De Club van Sinterklaas & Het Pratende Paard
plot_en: Amerigo, the horse of St. Nicholas, can suddenly talk. A villain steals the horse and hopes to win a talent contest with it. Will the Club, with the help of Stijn, succeed in finding the horse back before St. Nicholas' eve?
